alert.note: Alert for Bosque (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 28 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Texas, including the following county, Bosque. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is ongoing or imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 6 and 9 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Clifton, Meridian, Laguna Park, Iredell, Cranfills Gap, Meridian State Park, Lake Whitney, Walnut Springs, Morgan, Cedar Shores, Lakewood Harbor, Norse, Eulogy, Lakeside Village, Womack, Kopperl and Brazos Point.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
